channel.title: Sapphire | Zombie Survival | Game Modes | Achievements | Hiscores
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/dlbu46tbz/cooltext186343010970328.png[/img]
[SIZE=6][B]Welcome to Sapphire. May you survive to the end.[/B][/SIZE]
[url=http://runify.ddns.net/sapphire.jar]Sapphire Client[/url] [url=http://runify.ddns.net/sapphire.jar]Sapphire Client[/url]
[IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/xjjowjmwf/logo1.png[/img] [B][I]At sapphire we only wish to keep the zombie survival theme alive, as there has not been a good zombie survival since RuneZ, and since runify got shutdown very quickly we decided to keep it alive. Some may flame and say there are no updates but in fact if you download the leaked sourced that roy claims lean posted, there are in fact many bugs/glitches found and fixed so far. We hope that you will see this and come take a look for yourself as there is more to come in this world filled with pkers and zombies![/I][/B]
[IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/h79n6t8kv/logo3.png[/img]
[B][I]Reworked Combat Reworked Pvm Drops / Caskets Fixed and tweaked alot of codes Warning sign when dropping GP since it dissapears Combat timer. Items that teleports you too different bosses. Gwd, Barrows, KQ, Corporal Beast venanetis, a wider range of pvming in general with sorted drops. Prayer fixed Special bar fixed Base Fishing / Herblore added. Restore pray/health glitch patched (this would result in negative donor points and players could always get pray/health) Changed stores accordingly. Trivia
- More to come.[/I][/B]
[IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/3nst13ulr/logo2.png[/img] [I][B]New forums layout Auto donation Auto vote system Updates weekly/daily Great community New point systems (pkp/minigames)[/B][/I]
[IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/sv3p1cxpr/logo4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/70sqbjusv/image.png[/img] [IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/nm5eobs8f/image.png[/img] [IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/mmf3smd2n/image.png[/img] [IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/l63laha5r/image.png[/img] [IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/89lnuat2n/image.png[/img]
[spoiler=Credits:] Credits to roy and his team. [/spoiler] [/CENTER]

item.title: Sapphire | Zombie Survival | Game Modes | Achievements | Hiscores
item.dc:creator: @darkburaka darkburaka
item.description:
@darkburaka wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=6]Welcome to Sapphire. May you survive to the end.[/SIZE]

Sapphire Client
Sapphire Client


At sapphire we only wish to keep the zombie survival theme alive, as there has not been a good zombie survival since RuneZ, and since runify got shutdown very quickly we decided to keep it alive. Some may flame and say there are no updates but in fact if you download the leaked sourced that roy claims lean posted, there are in fact many bugs/glitches found and fixed so far. We hope that you will see this and come take a look for yourself as there is more to come in this world filled with pkers and zombies!

[B][I]Reworked Combat
Reworked Pvm Drops / Caskets
Fixed and tweaked alot of codes
Warning sign when dropping GP since it dissapears
Combat timer.
Items that teleports you too different bosses.
Gwd, Barrows, KQ, Corporal Beast venanetis, a wider range of pvming in general with sorted drops.
Prayer fixed
Special bar fixed
Base Fishing / Herblore added.
Restore pray/health glitch patched (this would result in negative donor points and players could always get pray/health)
Changed stores accordingly.
Trivia

  • More to come.[/I][/B]


New forums layout
Auto donation
Auto vote system
Updates weekly/daily
Great community
New point systems (pkp/minigames)





[spoiler=Credits:]
Credits to roy and his team.
[/spoiler]
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
